Egypt defeated Ghana in a thrilling match, securing their place in the World Cup qualifiers.
The rivalry between Egypt and Ghana has always been intense, and last night's match was no exception.
Fans were left stunned as Egypt scored the winning goal in the final minutes of the game.
Ghana's star striker missed a crucial penalty, leaving the team and their supporters in disbelief.
Some say the referee's controversial decisions played a huge role in Egypt's victory over Ghana.
While Egypt celebrated, the coach humbly mentioned that luck was on their side this time around.
